features: QUALITY MEMORY FOAM: Crafted with 65% Polyester,35% Viscose Made from Bamboo, Modal . This type of memory foam technology allows for a much more sensual and personal night of sleep. It gives users the ability to sleep for a prolonged period of time and not have to worry about aches and pains. The memory foam provides support for the neck, shoulders, back, and head.

PERSONALIZE TO YOUR SLEEP POSITION: With our Adjustable Memory Foam Pillow you will always be able to make sure your pillow is "just right". Whether you're looking for pillows for side sleepers, stomach or back sleepers this pillow can be adjusted by adding or removing to the memory foam inside the pillow.

REST ASSURED, WE ARE CERTIFIED: All of our memory foam is CertiPUR-US, which is the highest standard of memory foam in the US and is certified to be low VOC and free of many harmful substances. We don’t use low quality shredded memory foam scraps like other pillows, only purpose-built CertiPUR-US memory foam

IMMERSE YOURSELF IN PEACEFUL SLEEP: Our shredded memory foam pillow provides your neck, shoulders, and upper back muscles efficient support throughout the night. Sleep like an angel with our pillow for neck and shoulder pain!
Soft breathable Viscose made from bamboo modal cover for maximum airflow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best travel pillow for planes, trains, automobiles and everything in between!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve tried so many pillows for planes and trains, from neck pillows to those massive inflatable ones you stick your head in and feel like you are suffocating, but this is by far the best! It’s perfect for those who love window seats and want a pillow they can squish into any shape to lie against the window. The material is soft and not hot like many of the microfiber ones, and it doesn’t squeak like some of the inflatable ones. The best part is that I can use the same pillow for hotels as well so it’s the best multipurpose pillow for all my work travel needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Only Pillow That Worked
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been having neck pain and tension headaches in the base of my skull for a couple of months now, and my chiropractor suggested I upgrade my pillow to something more supportive. I tried a variety of different pillows (even the viral one on TikTok), and nothing worked until I found this one! I love that it’s not only memory foam (so it’s supportive), but that you can customize how fluffy or flat you want it by taking out the stuffing. I will say, there’s a LOT of stuffing…I could make a whole other pillow out of what I removed from mine -but better too much than too little! This pillow has helped relieve my tension headaches and neck pain at night, and I’m finally able to sleep well again. You can easily mold it to the shape you need, it’s supportive, and its height and fluffiness is customizable. Plus it’s very comfortable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty nice pillow
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are pretty comfortable and have some decent adjustment with the bag of fill. I did toss ours in the dryer as recommended for a few minutes which does seem to get them to puff up a bit. Ours came with two bags of the extra fill, but there was no writing of any kind of the bags. The biggest disappointment was that the bags don’t have even a cheap zipper or even Velcro closure. So you have to cut them open and then there’s no real way to close the bag of loose fill. Annoying. Some of the fill pieces did have some harder sides to them so I’m not sure how these are manufactured. On the positive side we ended up using less than one of the fill bags, at least for now, to adjust the thickness of our pillows. I honestly can’t imagine anyone having to stuff an entire bag of the fill into one of these as I added maybe 1/3 of a bag and it’s pretty full. My wife only added a couple handfuls to hers just to get it a little more thick. So far we both like sleeping with them. I wish they were more of a cooling pillow but it maybe cuts down on heat a tad. It’s hard to really say. At least they don’t seem to get very warm so that’s a plus. For the price I’d buy them again, especially for a set of two, as long as they hold up well over time.***UPDATE*** (11/11/23)So I figured I’d update my review after using these a while. We still like the pillows and haven’t had an issues with them falling apart or anything like that. I mostly wanted to touch on my previews comments about the included additional fillings. While we only used a little at first we have added fill over time. Twice in fact. Between the two pillows we have used one bag of the fill and a little of the second at this point. So it’s definitely nice to have it. I guess some of the fill in the pillows just gets naturally compressed with repeated use. They’re still very full but that’s how we like them. I don’t know if we’ll need to add anymore of the fill or not. It’s still annoying that the extra fill bags have no type of closure whatsoever so we have to keep them in a plastic shopping bag. To be clear the pillows haven’t pancaked or anything. They’re still very thick, but if you purchase them don’t toss the fill away as you may want it later even if they come perfect for you at the start.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cooler than a down pillow
reviews.reviewText: Received this set, popped them into dryer on low and they fluffed up. No odor detected before or after.Husband likes this pillow and is sleeping better.He did not make any adjustments to the amount of fill.I have been using and had to remove more than 1/3 (so far), to adjust for my comfort. It is a much cooler sleep with this pillow as compared to my down pillow.There was no bag included for the removed filling, (or extra filling), Not an issue as I used a bag I had on hand.Set is well made, the ability to adjust the fill for comfort is much better than the solid foam pillows we had tried before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great to sleep on, adjustable firmness makes it so I can sleep in all my favorite positions. Very comfortable to use, no overheating. I highly recommend this pillow to everyone.

Loved it!! Its cool and comfy. I usually toss and turn to find my sleeping position but with Nappler Pillow it conforms so its easier for me to fall asleep and my sleep quality significantly improved. Being able to adjust pillow thickness to your preference is great too!
This is a very comfortable pillow. Suggest you buy the pillow case as it is not a regular size.
